3@2.body:
Decentralized Censorship Resistant Global Blog Platform 
This is just (may be stupid)  idea. 
Every blogger creates its own blog site. 
Every reader creates its own blog reader (private or public) site where he can add zero-net site addresses of the bloggers.  
As soon as blogger will publish a new post on its own site the readers will see the article on their readers sites.   Finally this will work as usual blogger platform (with commenting and etc ) but only under direct blogger control.  If blogger is really good, readers will pay directly for the upcoming articles with bitcoins or any altcoins.
Tips are also possible I think :)
